short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Support utility tool for capturing information from a FortiGate

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows for capturing detailed debug information of a FortiGate's graphical user interface. Requires FortiOS 6.2.2 or greater.
